Package ciserver

Class Payload

java.lang.Object
ciserver.Payload
public class Payload
extends java.lang.Object
Extract and contains the relevant data from a GitHub Webhook push request.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Payload​(java.io.BufferedReader requestReader)
    Takes a BufferedReader containing a Github Webhook json payload and extracts the useful values.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getCloneUrl()
    Gets the clone URL.
    java.lang.String getRef()
    Gets the ref of the push.
    java.lang.String getStatusesUrl()
    Gets the status URL.

  • Method Details

    • getCloneUrl

      public java.lang.String getCloneUrl()
      Gets the clone URL.
      Returns:
      The URL needed to clone a repository

    • getRef

      public java.lang.String getRef()
      Gets the ref of the push.
      Returns:

    • getStatusesUrl

      public java.lang.String getStatusesUrl()
      Gets the status URL.
      Returns:
      The url needed to write a status message
